issue.title: bitcoind crash with corrupt wallet.dat
issue.body:
```
2025-03-20T00:52:09Z Using SQLite Version 3.38.5
2025-03-20T00:52:09Z Using wallet w1
2025-03-20T00:52:09Z init message: Loading walletâ€¦
2025-03-20T00:52:09Z SQLite Error. Code: 1. Message: no such column: minversion in "INSERT INTO main VALUES(?, ?)"
2025-03-20T00:52:09Z [w1] Releasing wallet w1..
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
  what():  SQLiteDatabase: Failed to close database: database is locked
```

I had observed `bitcoind` crash a few days back while testing it with a corrupt database. I was testing this because sqlite version was recently updated in core.

Not sure if it is relevant to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/32111. I can't comment in that issue because @dergoegge has blocked me on GitHub.

Feel free to ignore and close the issue if it's unrelated.
